text: allh subhanah hu aladhi 'arsal fi alearab aladhin la yqrwwn, wala kitab eindahum wala 'athar risalatan ldyhm, rasulana minhum 'iilaa alnaas jmyeana, yaqra ealayhim alqran, wythrhm min aleaqayid alfasdt walakhlaq alsyyt, wyellimhm alquran walsnt, 'iinahum kanuu min qabl bethth lafi anhraf wadih ean alhq. warslh subhanah 'iilaa qawm akharin lam yjyyu bedu, wsyjyywn min alearab wamin ghyrhm. wallah teala- whdh- hu aleaziz alghalb ealaa kl shy', alhakim fi aqwalh wafealh
